cards.title: Breach Mage
setup: Put two "Stable Breach" into play with 0 and 1 tokens in their Focus Pools.
Put two "Potent Breach" into play with 2 and 3 tokens in their Focus Pools.
gameplay: At the start of your turn, you may activate the [u]Cast[/u] effects of each of your Spells and destroy those spells.
powers: Destroy a Charge card. If you do, any player draws 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: I don't know how I got here, but I know this must be stopped.
